title: VP of Growth
about_the_job:
As the VP of Growth at Evermos, your role is to be the driving force behind Evermos's expansion. You will work closely with our leadership team to develop and execute strategies that will help us grow, attract more customers, and increase our revenue.

Key Responsibilities:
Collaborate closely with the founding team to define and refine the company's growth strategy and long-term objectives.
Conduct market research and competitor analysis to identify niche opportunities for growth.
Develop and implement holistic growth plans, encompassing product launches, go-to-market strategies, and targeted marketing campaigns.
Drive customer acquisition, retention, and upsell initiatives.
Optimize sales and marketing funnels to enhance conversion rates.
Build and lead a nimble, results-driven growth team, including marketing, sales, and business development professionals.
Foster a culture of innovation and provide mentorship and professional growth opportunities to team members.
Define and track key performance indicators (KPIs) to gauge growth success.
Leverage data insights to make informed decisions, iterate strategies, and enhance performance.
Identify and establish strategic partnerships, collaborations, and alliances to amplify growth.
Manage partnerships that align with the company's mission and growth objectives.
Continuously evaluate market trends and customer needs to identify avenues for new product or service offerings.
Oversee successful product launches and rapid market penetration.
Develop and manage the growth budget, ensuring cost-effective allocation of resources.
Monitor spending and ROI on growth initiatives, optimizing resource utilization.
Collaborate closely with customer support and experience teams to ensure exceptional customer journeys.
Implement strategies to enhance customer satisfaction, loyalty, and advocacy.

Requirements:
Demonstrated ability to think creatively and entrepreneurially, fostering a growth-oriented culture.
Exceptional leadership skills with the ability to build, inspire, and lead high-performing teams in fast-paced environment.
Proficiency in data analysis and interpretation to drive data-centric decision-making.
Strong verbal and written communication skills to articulate growth strategies and results effectively.
Deep understanding of the startup landscape, including emerging trends, funding sources, and market dynamics.
Proactive approach to identifying and capitalizing on growth opportunities while navigating the unpredictability of startup life.
Strong commitment to achieving and exceeding growth targets and KPIs in a resource-constrained environment.
Solid financial management skills to optimize resource allocation and budget management.
Uphold the highest ethical standards and integrity in all growth-related activities.
Strong networking skills and the ability to build and nurture relationships with key stakeholders, investors, and partners within the startup ecosystem.

As the VP of Growth in Evermos, you'll be a key player in our journey to success, driving our growth and helping us reach new heights. Your role is all about being strategic, leading a great team, and getting results.

NOTE:
Evermos is committed to providing an inclusive environment where equal opportunities are available to all applicants regardless of race, color, religion, gender, national origin, disability, age, genetic information, marital status, pregnancy, or related condition. We will not tolerate discrimination or harassment based on any of these characteristics.

We also emphasize the importance of diversity in all aspects of employment including recruitment, hiring, promotions, training, and organization operations.

title: Performance Marketing Analyst
company_type: 201-500 employees · IT Services and IT Consulting
about_the_job:
About the role:
In this role you will work closely with the marketing team to understand business goals, translate them into actionable strategies, and implement campaigns that deliver measurable results. This role will be a data enthusiast, constantly evaluating campaign performance and making data-driven decisions to maximize ROI.

What you’ll do (Responsibilities):
Assist with the planning and execution of performance marketing campaigns across multiple channels (e.g., Google Ads, Social Media Ads, Programmatic Advertising)
Manage campaign budgets and optimize spending for maximum efficiency and ROI
Analyze campaign performance data and generate insights to inform strategy adjustments
Collaborate with designers and copywriters to develop engaging ad creatives
Collaborate with developers & product owners to optimize marketing funnel and ensure accurate tracking
Monitor industry trends and stay up-to-date on the latest digital marketing platforms and technologies
Prepare reports and presentations to communicate campaign results and recommendations
Perform other marketing tasks as assigned

What capabilities you’ll need (Requirements):
Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business, or a related field (Preferred)
Strong understanding of digital marketing principles and concepts
Familiarity with popular performance marketing platforms like Google Ads, Facebook Ads, or similar
Excellent analytical and data-driven decision-making skills
Strong communication, written, and verbal skills
Ability to work independently and as part of a team
Highly organized and detail-oriented
Passion for technology and a constant thirst for learning new things

Bonus points if you have the following skills:
Experience in B2B SaaS industry is a big plus
Experience in programmatic marketing such as Criteo
Experience with conversion optimization techniques (A/B testing, landing page optimization)
Understanding of SEO and organic marketing channels
Experience working in a fast-paced startup environment

Excellent communication and collaboration skills.
Budget management experience and ability to optimize resources for maximum impact.

title: Commodity Manager, Consumer Electronics Category
about_the_job:
About The Company
Founded in 2015, Xingyun Group is a leader in global B2B e-commerce service platform. Xingyun now has more than 3,000 employees worldwide and has built a multidivisional structure consisting of Shenzhen, Hangzhou, Shanghai, Hong Kong, and Singapore. Xingyun has set up subsidiaries in 72 countries and one region globally, including Germany, Japan, Australia, etc.

Polibeli (part of Xingyun Group) is a B2B online wholesale platform built for SMEs in Indonesia.
Our mission is to empower entrepreneurs and shop-owners to pursue their business dreams with our strong supply chain capabilities and reliable e-commerce platform.

Job Description
Research and analyze the consumer electronics market to identify potential new suppliers aligned with the company's strategy.
Reach out to potential suppliers through cold calls, email campaigns, and in-person meetings to establish relationships and negotiate deals.
Negotiate and secure deals with new suppliers meeting or exceeding company targets for product quality, pricing, and delivery.
Develop and maintain strong relationships with existing suppliers to ensure continued support and opportunities for growth.
Stay up-to-date on industry trends, regulations, and competitors to inform the company's strategy and supplier negotiations.
Collaborate with the merchandising team to onboard new suppliers and ensure accurate representation of their products on the app.
Provide regular reports on supplier activity, acquisition progress, and performance metrics to the leadership team.

Qualifications:
Bachelor's Degree in Business, Marketing, or a related field.
Fluency in English is a must.
At least 3 years of experience in business development, with a strong track record of success in securing suppliers deals, preferably in the consumer electronics industry.
Data-driven with strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
Excellent communication and negotiations skills, with the ability to close deals.
Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
Proficient in Microsoft Office and CRM software.
Demonstrated ability to meet exceed targets in a fast-paced and dynamic environment.
Willing to work from the office in Sudirman.

title: Digital Media Planner
about_the_job:
About You
You're a go-getter with mad juggling skills (or multiple hats) who can thrive in a fast-paced, agile environment
You enjoy doing purpose-led and meaningful work
You have a strong thirst for knowledge and are driven to find solutions that don't exist yet
You are comfortable with ambiguity and extremely resourceful (in your past life, you could've been a detective)
You always find a way to get things done without sacrificing the quality of your work, integrity, and values
No task is off limits for you
You are humble and prioritize the success of the team over your own with an eagerness to help those around you
You don't shy away from challenges and can bounce back from setbacks

What you’ll do and what success looks like in this role:
Support performance marketing managers and assist with the planning and execution of media campaigns across multiple channels.
Conduct research and analysis for the application market and competitive insights to support overall digital activities.
Work closely with media vendors to negotiate rates, secure placements, and ensure campaigns are executed as planned.
Monitor media purchases to ensure they are performing as expected and provide regular reports on key metrics.
Create and manage media budgets, ensuring they are implemented on time and within budget.
Collaborate with internal teams and external partners to execute campaigns smoothly.
Good networking with advertising platforms and new media technologies to recommend new opportunities in digital media buying.

What Is Required And What We’re Looking For
3-4 years experience in digital media purchasing or planning.
Strong negotiation skills with the ability to get favorable prices and placements.
Good analytical skills with the ability to interpret data and make decisions based on data.
Good communication and interpersonal skills to work effectively with internal and external stakeholders.
Detail-oriented with the ability to handle multiple tasks and prioritize deadlines.
Passionate about the media industry and eager to learn and grow in the role.
Both in organizational skills, project management, and a collaborative mindset with various stakeholders.
A customer-focused mindset and good analytical skills.
A structured approach to creativity and audience insights

title: Product Marketing Manager

title: Marketing Manager
about_the_job:
Job Title: Marketing Manager & Business Development Manager
Company: Sakina
Location: Remote
Type: Contract
About Us: Sakina is a forward-thinking mental health startup primarily serving the Muslim community, with a vision that embraces potential pivoting to broader markets. We are dedicated to providing culturally sensitive and innovative mental health solutions. As we continue to grow, we are looking for a Marketing Manager/Business Development who is passionate about making a meaningful impact in the mental health sector.
Job Description: As our Marketing Manager/Business Development, you will be instrumental in crafting and executing marketing strategies tailored to our unique market. Your role will encompass a range of responsibilities, including but not limited to:
Developing Marketing Strategies: Creating targeted marketing plans that resonate with the Muslim community, while also being adaptable for potential pivots.
Client Communication & Onboarding: Engaging with potential clients in a manner that is culturally respectful and effective, managing the client onboarding process to ensure a seamless transition.
Business Analysis: Conducting detailed market research and analysis within the Muslim community and broader markets to guide strategic decisions and identify growth opportunities.
Outreach & Networking: Actively seeking and establishing relationships with potential clients and partners.
Applying to Programs: Seeking out and applying to accelerator programs and other opportunities for startup growth and development.
Additional Responsibilities: Undertaking other tasks and projects as requested to support the startup's evolving needs.
Requirements:
Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business Administration, Communications or related field, or equivalent experience
A minimum of 3 years of experience in marketing and business analysis.
Excellent command of the English language.
Experience with SEO, PPC, and digital marketing campaigns
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
Independent worker with a collaborative spirit, able to thrive in a fast-paced startup environment.
A strong interest and commitment to mental health and wellness.
What We Offer:
Opportunities for professional growth and development.
A compensation package that includes both cash and stock options.
How to Apply: Please send your CV and a cover letter explaining your suitability for this role, to team@sakina.io. Applications are open until 14th of February 2024.

title: ASEAN Marketing Manager (Jakarta)
company_type: 5,001-10,000 employees · IT Services and IT Consulting
about_the_job:
Job Description
· Reporting to the Head of Marketing, ASEAN, the ASEAN Marketing Manager works closely with ASEAN sales leaders and other functional leaders to define and implement the local marketing strategy to support business growth and GTM and achieve marketing KPIs
· Develop and manage yearly and quarterly marketing plans and associated budgets based on the defined Country strategic priorities of Singapore, Malaysia, Indonesia, Vietnam, Thailand and Philippines.
· Own and drive effective demand and lead generation programs (direct mail, email, e-Newsletters, content syndication, telemarketing, LinkedIn, seminars, executive roundtables, webinars and tradeshows) in collaboration with ASEAN sales leaders to support ASEAN business growth objectives
· Deliver high-quality leads that maximise the value and ROI on all marketing spend and achieve KPIs of MQL, marketing-sourced pipeline and marketing-sourced revenue
· Support the utilization of Alliance Partner MDF and enable appropriate spend of MDF on joint marketing initiatives in line with policy and guidelines to drive returns 
· Liaise and collaborate closely with key stakeholders to get buy-in, support and feedback: ASEAN and APAC marketing teams, ASEAN sales organization, alliance and channel partners, agencies and others 
· Document programs and conduct post analysis, evaluation and reports on all programs for quarterly business reviews, performance measurements and audits
· Manage the marketing procurement process with the support of marketing operations team
· Support global strategy through effective and timely delivery of solution and product launches at Country level 
· Collaborate with team members to support non-demand generation activities that support Country market presence and objectives through PR, social media and customer advocacy 
· Act as local brand champion; embrace the philosophy and deploy the vision to the market
   Skills & Qualifications:
· Bachelor’s Degree in Marketing
· 8 to 10 years B2B Marketing experience in IT across all marketing domains in ASEAN (Singapore, Malaysia, Indonesia, Vietnam, Thailand and Philippines) markets
· Proven successful marketing plan development and implementation skills are essential
· Demonstrate understanding of marketing disciplines and marketing mix including audience targeting, and marketing vehicles
· Ability to develop and articulate strategy, able to drive translation of strategy into successful tactics and execution
· Attention for detail, highly organized and multi-tasking to handle several campaigns and timelines simultaneously
· Thrive in a demanding environment, requiring high degree of deadline-driven productivity, commitment, adaptability, communication, initiative and follow-through
· Good command of English and Bahasa; able to do copywriting and translation
· Strong negotiation skills and effective budget management capability and accountability
· Strong project management skills with ability to recognise, adapt and respond to changing market and business environments

title: Social Media Executive
about_the_job:
Job Number 24017446

Job Category Sales & Marketing

Location The Ritz-Carlton Bali, Jalan Raya Nusa Dua Selatan Lot III, Bali, Bali, Indonesia VIEW ON MAP

Schedule Full-Time

Located Remotely? N

Relocation? N

Position Type Non-Management

Position Summary

We offer guests an experience that is memorable and unique; one that travels with them through the entire guest journey. From their initial interactions with us on social media channels through their time in our hotel and bar, you will help our guests truly experience what our brand is all about. As a Social Media & Event Activator, you will use your knowledge of the local market and influencers to connect with our guests on social channels to create hotel and brand awareness, grow reach, and drive engagement. When not building buzz on social media, you will serve as a seamless point of contact for guests hosting events in the hotel. Through your flawless event execution, you will give guests confidence in our brand’s ability to remove the friction from event planning and delivery. Using creative content, online conversations, relevant partnerships, and well-executed events, you will play host to guests in two of the most important places where they spend time with us: in the hotel and online.

No matter what position you are in, there are a few things that are critical to success – creating a safe work place, following company policies and procedures, upholding quality standards, and ensuring your uniform, personal appearance, and communications are professional. Social Media & Event Activators will be on their feet and moving around (stand, sit, or walk for an extended time) and taking a hands-on approach to work (move, lift, carry, push, pull, and place objects weighing less than or equal to 25 pounds without assistance). Doing all these things well (and other reasonable job duties as requested) is critical for Social Media & Event Activators – to get it right for our guests and our business each and every time.

Marriott International is an equal opportunity employer. We believe in hiring a diverse workforce and sustaining an inclusive, people-first culture. We are committed to non-discrimination on any protected basis, such as disability and veteran status, or any other basis covered under applicable law.

At more than 100 award-winning properties worldwide, The Ritz-Carlton Ladies and Gentlemen create experiences so exceptional that long after a guest stays with us, the experience stays with them. Attracting the world’s top hospitality professionals who curate lifelong memories, we believe that everyone succeeds when they are empowered to be creative, thoughtful and compassionate.

Every day, we set the standard for rare and special luxury service the world over and pride ourselves on delivering excellence in the care and comfort of our guests.

Your role will be to ensure that the “Gold Standards” of The Ritz-Carlton are delivered graciously and thoughtfully every day. The Gold Standards are the foundation of The Ritz-Carlton and are what guides us each day to be better than the next. It is this foundation and our belief that our culture drives success by which The Ritz Carlton has earned the reputation as a global brand leader in luxury hospitality. As part of our team, you will learn and exemplify the Gold Standards, such as our Employee Promise, Credo and our Service Values. And our promise to you is that we offer the chance to be proud of the work you do and who you work with.

In joining The Ritz-Carlton, you join a portfolio of brands with Marriott International. Be where you can do your best work, begin your purpose, belong to an amazing global team, and become the best version of you.

Process requests for redeeming Marriott Rewards points. Process all reservation requests, changes, and cancellations received by phone, fax, or mail. Enter Marriott Rewards information into appropriate software when taking guest reservations. Answer, record, and process all guest calls, requests, questions, or concerns. Perform general office duties to support Sales & Marketing (e.g., filing, sending emails, typing, faxing).

Assist management in training and motivating employees; serve as a role model. Follow all company policies and procedures; ensure uniform and personal appearance are clean and professional; maintain confidentiality of proprietary information; protect company assets. Welcome and acknowledge all guests according to company standards; anticipate and address guests’ service needs; thank guests with genuine appreciation. Speak with others using clear and professional language; prepare and review written documents accurately and completely; answer telephones using appropriate etiquette. Develop and maintain positive working relationships with others; support team to reach common goals; listen and respond appropriately to the concerns of other employees. Monitor the performance of others to ensure adherence to quality expectations and standards. Read and visually verify information in a variety of formats. Move, lift, carry, push, pull, and place objects weighing less than or equal to 10 pounds without assistance. Perform other reasonable job duties as requested by Supervisors.

Marriott International is an equal opportunity employer. We believe in hiring a diverse workforce and sustaining an inclusive, people-first culture. We are committed to non-discrimination on any protected basis, such as disability and veteran status, or any other basis covered under applicable law.

When you join the Sheraton family, you become a member of its global community. We’ve been a place to gather and connect since 1937. At Sheraton, associates create a sense of belonging in more than 400 communities around the world. We invite, we welcome, and we connect guests through engaging experiences and thoughtful service. If you’re a team player who is excited to deliver a meaningful guest experience, we encourage you to explore your next career opportunity with Sheraton. Join us on our mission to be ‘The World’s Gathering Place’. In joining Sheraton Hotels & Resorts, you join a portfolio of brands with Marriott International. Be where you can do your best work, begin your purpose, belong to an amazing global team, and become the best version of you.

title: Senior Digital Marketing
company_type: 1,001-5,000 employees · Paper and Forest Product Manufacturing
about_the_job:
Deskripsi:
Bertanggungjawab atas semua hal yang berhubungan dengan pemasaran dan branding produk perusahaan di masyarakat secara digital.
Menyusun perencanaan dan strategi untuk promosi produk melalui digital.
Merencanakan event penting di market sosial media
Membuat dan mengevaluasi konten yang berkualitas untuk memudahkan kostumer mendapat informasi produk yang ditawarkan.
Memelihara sosial media milik perusahaan termasuk dalam hal ini pra produksi, stock, planning, report design dan report engagement.
Mengidentifikasi dan mengevaluasi target pasar melalui platform sosial media melalui Facebook, Instagram, Youtube, Tiktok dll.
Menjalin kerjasama dengan sosial media platform dan afiliasi serta marketplace untuk semua aktivitas marketing.
Kriteria :
S1 Segala Jurusan
Pengalaman minimal 3 tahun sebagai Senior Digital Marketing
Memiliki kemampuan riset pasar
Memahami SEO (Search Engine Optimization)
Kemampuan berpikir strategis
Mampu memanage iklan di sosial media
Memiliki kemampuan google analytic, trafic data dan algoritma sosial media

Company Profile :
PT Suparma Tbk adalah perusahaan manufaktur yang bergerak di
bidang kertas dan tisu. Perusahaan ini didirikan di Surabaya pada tahun 1976 di
atas lahan seluas 5 hektar, dengan jumlah tenaga kerja 100 orang. Pada tahun
2015 PT Suparma Tbk telah memiliki 8 unit mesin kertas dengan total kapasitas
230.000 ton per tahun, berdiri di atas lahan seluas ±26 hektar dengan jumlah
tenaga kerja mencapai 2000 orang.
Dalam menyongsong era globalisasi, PT Suparma Tbk memutuskan
selangkah lebih maju dengan menjadi perusahaan go public dan terdaftar di Bursa Efek Jakarta pada
tanggal 15 November 1994. PT. Suparma Tbk telah memiliki sertifikat ISO
9001:2015, ISO 14001:2015, FSC v.3.1, FSSC 22000 v.5.1 dan HAS 23000 dengan
beraneka ragam produk kertas industri, kertas dan tisu berkualitas tinggi.

Email : hrd_recruitment@ptsuparmatbk.com
IG : hr.ptsuparmatbk

title: Merchandiser
about_the_job:
As a Merchandiser, you will be responsible for monitoring stock movements, analyzing sales data, and allocating products to all stores according to store capacity and sales data. You will also analyze brand performance, sales, stock/inventory, and merchandise, rotate stock of goods to support store sales, and recommend products to be included in the purchase plan. You will become a product knowledge base, produce periodic sales reports and product allocation, handle product returns, and manage damaged products.

Responsibilites:
Monitoring stock movements and ensure the availability of stock of selling and non-selling goods in all stores,
Perform and allocate products to all stores according to store capacity and sales data
Analyzing sales data and find fast-moving and slow moving products in every store and e-commerce
Monitoring and analyzing brand performance, sales, stock/inventory, and merchandise
Rotate stock of goods to support store sales
Manage damaged goods & maintain good relationship with related third parties (such as bag spa)
Create and support promotion or sale event
Monitoring movement of inventory whether it is to store, or for other purpose (beside sales)

Requirements:
Bachelor’s Degree from any major
Proficient in Microsoft Excel and Inventory
Highly passionate in fashion retail
Can work in flexible working hours
Work well under pressure
Multitasking
Attention to detail
High initiative
Responsible

title: Campaign Specialist
about_the_job:
Company Description
Manna Indo Lakta (MIL) is a trusted breast milk booster company in Indonesia under the brand MamaBear. Since 2016, we have helped more than 3,000,000 breastfeeding mothers through 500 resellers spread across Indonesia and Philippines. MamaBear has 5 flagship products, including Breast Milk Booster Tea, Almond Oat Cookies, Powder Drink: Zoya Mix, Powder Drink: Almon Mix, and Breast Milk Storage Bags. Joining us is an opportunity for you to contribute to building the next generation.

Duties and Responsibilities: 
Lead and oversee end-to-end execution of major marketing campaigns.
Develop and implement campaign strategies to achieve objectives.
Provide guidance and support to ensure the team's success.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure seamless execution.
Monitor and analyze campaign performance metrics.
Provide insights and recommendations for optimization.
Utilize strong project management skills to oversee the end-to-end execution of campaigns, including timelines, budgets, and deliverables.
Manage campaign budgets effectively to maximize ROI
Work closely with creative, content, and digital teams to align campaign elements.

Requirements:
Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business, or a related field.
Proven experience in campaign management, with a focus on strategic planning.
Strong leadership skills with the ability to motivate and guide a team.
Excellent project management skills, with the ability to multitask and meet tight deadlines.
Familiarity with relevant tools and platforms for campaign execution.
Analytical mindset with proficiency in performance tracking tools.
Excellent communication and collaboration skills.
Demonstrated success in managing budgets and achieving campaign goals.

title: Creative Director
about_the_job:
The last 4 years have been very interesting for us. We have supported many companies to grow through digital transformation. Our integrated business software have helped companies to run their business process more efficiently, while our digital marketing team have increased the growth of their brands and most importantly, their revenue.

And now, we wanted to focus on doing it on a bigger scale. Helping many more companies to grow faster. Therefore, we are currently looking for a highly motivated, result oriented, persistent and passionate professional to join our team to fill the below position: 

Creative Director
(Jakarta)

Responsibilities:
Conceptualize and execute high-impact social media campaigns aligned with marketing objectives
Develop compelling storylines and visual identities that resonate with our target audience.
Lead and inspire a team of creatives (videographers, photographers, graphic designers) to deliver exceptional content.
Integrate emerging social media trends into a data-driven content strategy for maximum reach and engagement.
Analyze social media performance data and utilize insights to optimize content and campaign strategies.
Manage multiple projects simultaneously and meet deadlines efficiently.

Qualifications :
A visual storyteller with a Bachelor's degree and/or 2-3 years of professional experience in related field.
An eye for design, headlines, and creativity.
Independent, strong leadership, self-motivated, able to work well under pressure, team builder, fast learner.
Ability to multitask and meet deadlines while maintaining attention to detail.
Strong communication ability (oral and written).
Excellent interpersonal communication skills.
Must attach your Portfolio to your CV
